content: सेवित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [सेव्-क्त] {@--1@} Served, attended upon, worshipped. {@--2@} Followed, practised, pursued. {@--3@} Frequented by, resorted to, inhabited by, haunted by; <ls>Pt. 5. 23.</ls> {@--4@} Protected, preserved. {@--5@} Enjoyed, used. --तं {@--1@} An apple. {@--2@} The jujube.
